name: Quick Siphon
description: Focus your staff's power to apply Minor Lifesteal to an enemy for 30 seconds, healing you and your allies for 600 Health every 1 second when damaging them.  When you or an ally hits the target, they gain Minor Expedition, which increases their Movement Speed by 15% for 4 seconds.
effectLines: Allies who hit the enemy target also gain Minor Expedition.
rawDescription:
Focus your staff's power to apply <<1>> to an enemy for <<2>>, healing you and your allies for <<3>> Health every <<4>> when damaging them.

When you or an ally hits the target, they gain <<5>>, which increases their Movement Speed by <<6>> for <<7>>.
